data.question: He is also ---- heir of that property.
The man / cannot live /by bread alone / no errors---choose the error part
data.moreDetails: don't use the with the wordsman,gold.iron,to represent a whole group

data.question: ------------ Queen victoria is a famous ship
----- Mount Everest is the highest mountain peak
data.moreDetails: We can use 'the' with mountain ranges and Island groups.but don't use with single name of mountain / Island

data.question: The spanish refers ----
data.moreDetails:
(We never use any article with the name of language but the world LANGUAGE comes with it 'the' should be used)
eg :/She  speaks ----- English - no articles/
 /She speaks ---- English language fluently - the/
/(If the article 'the' comes with language is refers the nation/people)/
/eg:There were several battles between---- English and --- French [ans:the--the]/

data.question: The carpender is going to ----- school now
data.moreDetails: (If we go any place for any particular purpose "the" should be used)

data.question: My uncle works in ---- Calicut University
data.moreDetails: (Don't use article with institution named withperson / place)
